name: Maize
careTip: Ensure adequate soil moisture during germination.

name: Rice
careTip: Keep fields flooded during early growth stages.

name: Wheat
careTip: Avoid waterlogging and ensure good drainage.

name: Tomato
careTip: Stake plants and monitor for pests.

name: Cassava
careTip: Harvest when leaves turn yellow.

name: Sorghum
careTip: Thin seedlings to avoid overcrowding.

name: Millet
careTip: Weed regularly during early growth.

name: Soybean
careTip: Inoculate seeds with rhizobium.

name: Groundnut
careTip: Avoid waterlogging and harvest on time.

name: Cowpea
careTip: Control aphids and thrips early.

name: Yam
careTip: Stake vines and mulch to retain moisture.

name: Sweet Potato
careTip: Plant on ridges for better yield.

name: Cabbage
careTip: Apply organic manure before planting.

name: Carrot
careTip: Thin seedlings to 5cm apart.

name: Onion
careTip: Irrigate moderately and avoid flooding.

name: Pepper
careTip: Mulch to conserve soil moisture.

name: Okra
careTip: Harvest pods when young and tender.

name: Spinach
careTip: Harvest leaves regularly to encourage growth.

name: Pumpkin
careTip: Provide enough space for vines to spread.

name: Banana
careTip: Support plants with stakes to prevent lodging.
